document_data.mainbody:
The infernal cane was a magic rod said to be imbued with the power of Hadar. It could be found in Waterdeep as of the late 15 century DR.
The infernal cane could be used to fire long-range bolts of grasping energy that attempted to pull victims toward the canes wielder.
* Farideh, a tiefling warlock who worked as an adventurer on behalf of Laeral Silverhand, the Open Lord of Waterdeep, during the late 15 century DR.
